mapper.select: SELECT a.GROUP_NAME groupName, c.user_id userId, c.user_name userName, c.password, c.display_name displayName, c.isLocked, c.failed_login_count failedLoginCount, c.create_time createTime, -- c.user_mail userMail, -- c.user_phone userPhone, c.user_description userDescription, c.district_name distinctName, c.department_name departmentName, c.department_id departmentId, c.create_user_id createUserId, c.city_id cityId, c.region_id regionId, d.FILE_PATH userAvatar, CASE e.PROJECT_MANAGE_ROLE WHEN 'REGION_PM' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END userAuthority, f.file_path faceIdUrl FROM tco_user_v2 c left JOIN TCO_USER_GROUPS b on b.USER_ID = c.USER_ID LEFT JOIN tco_groups a on a.group_id = b.GROUP_ID LEFT JOIN TCO_USER_AVATAR d on d.USER_ID = c.USER_ID LEFT JOIN os_pr_person_cfg e ON e.USER_ID = c.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TCO_USER_FACEID f on f.user_id = c.user_id WHERE b.GROUP_ID='7b6f7a37-08e9-4493-8204-965a23a71274' AND c.USER_NAME=#{name}
